text: For part 2 of module 6, can I post my PSA as a pdf file?

elements.text: For part 2 of module 6, can I post my PSA as a pdf file?

text: A PDF is the appropriate file type, but we'd like you to practice providing "read" access through your OneDrive folder as part of the learning objective of this exercise. This is a common way to share files, and it also makes it easy for you to modify the file as needed and keep the same link. In addition, if someone posts a video or some other format, the link will still give the reviewer access. We won't have to deal with multiple file formats within Blackboard. I realize that this is a long answer (!) but want to explain why we are asking you to load your file this way.
